channel.title: 群晖 on 霸气千秋
channel.description: Recent content in 群晖 on 霸气千秋

item.title: 群晖修改 docker 源
item.description: 修改配置文件 vi /var/packages/Docker/etc/dockerd.json 可以看到如下配置 { "data-root" : "/var/packages/Docker/target/docker", "log-driver" : "json-file", "registry-mirrors" : [] } 改为如下即可 { "data-root" : "/var/packages/Docker/target/docker", "log-driver" : "json-file", "registry-mirrors" : [] } 完成配置之后重启群晖 docker 组件 synoservice --restart pkgctl-Docker
